conversion_verification.notes: Successful volumetric transformation with clear orthographic-isometric perspective.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D depth, consistent wall thickness, and clear separation of planes.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High layout fidelity; minor shift in the entry door geometry and hallway partition thickness.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture assets match the 2D plan types and placement almost perfectly, including the balcony/closet detail.

visual_clarity.notes: Lighting is clean and enhances geometry. Presentation is professional and free of text contamination.

detected_errors.description: Main entrance door to the right of the living area is rendered as a wall gap rather than a clear door swing geometry.

summary: An exceptionally faithful and geometrically accurate 3D transformation that preserves the exact layout and furniture arrangement of the source floor plan.
